Title: Expands the monitoring of student incidents within the online occurrence reporting system
Summary: Expands the monitoring of student incidents within the online occurrence reporting system to maintain and store data for the entirety of a student's elementary and secondary education, in order to allow school principals to identify repeated incidents of behavior and determine if additional support or intervention is needed.
LawCode: Add ยง21-981.3, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to expanding the monitoring of student incidents to identify repeated incidents of behavior
